name: A Beautiful Mine
note: You're an ace with explosives.

name: Actor
note: +1 Charisma, skilled at mimicry and dramatics

name: Additional Augment
note: Gain another cybernetic augmentation

name: Alert
note: +5 to Initiative, can't be surprised, no advantage for hidden attackers

name: Athlete
note: +1 to Strength or Dexterity - you have undergone extensive physical training

name: Big Game Hunter
note: +1 Strength, additional damage to larger, organic creatures

name: Biotic Slayer
note: You have practiced techniques useful in melee combat against biotic wielders

name: Card Shark
note: No one can beat you in games of chance.

name: Charger
note: Make a melee attack or shove after the Dash action

name: Come Get Me
note: Draw the enemy fire.

name: Cranial Bruiser
note: Headbutt stuff!

name: Dual Wielder
note: +1 AC bonus, wield heavier weapons, draw or stow two weapons at once

name: Durable
note: +1 Constitution, minimum Con modifier x2 on spent Hit Dice

name: Elemental Adept
note: Spells you cast ignore resistance to damage of the chosen type
prerequisite: The ability to cast at least one spell

name: Enhanced Optics
note: Increased vision. Proficiency in Perception, Investigation, and Insight

name: Featherlight
note: +1 Dexterity, increased speed and you don't set off weight based traps

name: Grace Under Fire
note: Keep a cool head when attacked

name: Grappler
note: Hold your own in close-quarters grappling

name: Grenadier
note: Additional grenades. Can throw grenades as an action for additional benefits.

name: Hair-Trigger
note: +1 Dexterity, mastery of Double Tap weapons

name: Heavily Armored
note: +1 Strength, proficiency with heavy armor

name: Heavy Armor Master
note: +1 Strength, damage reduction from nonmagical weapons

name: Keen Mind
note: +1 Intelligence, track time, direction, and detail with uncanny precision

name: Lightly Armored
note: +1 Strength or Dexterity, proficiency with light armor

name: Lucky
note: You have inexplicable luck

name: Medium Armor Master
note: You have practiced moving in medium armor

name: Melee Specialist
note: +1 Strength or Dexterity, additional attacks with melee weapons

name: Mobile
note: You are exceptionally speedy and agile

name: Moderately Armored
note: +1 Strength or Dexterity, proficiency with medium armor and shields

name: Nerves of Steel
note: You are resistant to becoming frightened and stunned.

name: Observant
note: +1 Wisdom, quick to notice details of your environment

name: Resilient
note: +1 and proficiency with saving throws to a chosen ability score

name: Savage Attacker
note: Reroll damage dice for melee weapon attacks

name: Sentinel
note: Take advantage of every drop in any enemy's guard

name: Sharpshooter
note: Ranged weapons mastery - make shots that others find impossible

name: Skilled
note: Gain proficiency in 3 additional skills

name: Skulker
note: You are expert at slinking through shadows

name: Squad Leader
note: Heal and inspire allies to overcome negative conditions.

name: Tavern Brawler
note: +1 Strength or Constitution, improved improvised weapons

name: Tough
note: Gain +2 hit points per character level

name: War Caster
note: You have practiced casting spells in the midst of combat
prerequisite: The ability to cast at least one spell

name: Warlord's Blood Rage
note: An even deadlier blood rage.

name: Wealth of Knowledge
note: +1 Intelligence, advantage on Intelligence based skill checks

name: Weapon Master
note: +1 Strength or Dexterity, 2 additional weapon proficiencies
